name: 學習理論概論
description:
本課程旨在透過課堂講解、小組討論、分組報告，帶領學生
了解學習理論、學習歷程的基本概念，內容包含不同學派的學習理論、學習心理學、認知學習理論、社會認知論、訊息處理論等，並且探討學習理論之於華語教學的實際應用。
goals: 能瞭解學習理論的基本概念與理論
能應用學習理論於華語文教學領域
能透過小組合作培養合作學習的能力

methodologies.note: To illustrate the basic concepts of different learning theories and their pedagogical applications.
To divide students in small groups of 4 or 5 students and proceed small group discussion on the focused topics.
To guide the students to collaboratively design learning activities according to specific learning theories and evaluate their online teaching design and practice to CFL students from UVA.
To have students present their teaching plan and reflection on their teaching practice, group by group.

grading.note: Students should actively engage in in-class discussion and participate in the learning activities led by the instructor.
Each small group should give a 5-minute oral presentation of their own learning activity designs and reflection on their online teaching after the lecture of each learning theory.
